title: The White Manhattan Recipe
full_text:
The White Manhattan Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Active
1 min
Total
1 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
ounces
white whiskey
1/2
ounce
blanc vermouth
(Dolin preferred)
1/2
ounce
Benedictine
3
dashes
orange bitters
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well until chilled, about 30 seconds. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Special Equipment
Mixing glass, bar spoon, strainer
Whiskey
Liqueurs & Fortified Wines
